00021 namespace amf {

00023 class RandomInitialization
00024 {
00025  public:
00026   // Empty constructor required for the InitializeRule template
00027   RandomInitialization() { }
00028 
00029   template<typename MatType>
00030   inline static void Initialize(const MatType& V,
00031                                 const size_t r,
00032                                 arma::mat& W,
00033                                 arma::mat& H)
00034   {
00035     // Simple implementation (left in the header file due to its simplicity).
00036     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00037     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00038 
00039     // Intialize to random values.
00040     W.randu(n, r);
00041     H.randu(r, m);
00042   }
00043 };

00045 }; // namespace amf
